name: Goblin Quest (Ronnieeinnor)
description:
This is my first mini game, a plat former with a simple goal and controls. the player have one skill and enemies follows when you are near them, though they can't hurt you, they are harmless so don't worry. 

I made this Mini game for me to learn and to encounter problems early for the game that I'm planning to do in the future.  I got it from the inspirational video of Lost Relic Games Channel saying that "You need to do and finish small projects first before going into a Big one that you want" . He's really awesome 🔥 🔥🔥 his tutorials are beginner friendly and not complicated, he helps people who are aspiring to be a game developer like me  😁.  

My second mini game will be schedule this week. I'll try my best to improve it than the first one 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
